1:
upstream:
  default:
    - tcp+udp:${GATEWAY_ADDR}
customDNS:
  mapping:
    ${SECRET_DOMAIN}: ${METALLB_INGRESS_ADDR}
blocking:
  blackLists:
    ads:
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ookangzheng/dbl-oisd-nl/master/dbl.txt
      - |
        /^ad([sxv]?[0-9]*|system)[_.-]([^.[:space:]]+\.){1,}|[_.-]ad([sxv]?[0-9]*|system)[_.-]/
        /^(.+[_.-])?adse?rv(er?|ice)?s?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^(.+[_.-])?telemetry[_.-]/
        /^adim(age|g)s?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^adtrack(er|ing)?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^advert(s|is(ing|ements?))?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^aff(iliat(es?|ion))?[_.-]/
        /^analytics?[_.-]/
        /^banners?[_.-]/
        /^beacons?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^count(ers?)?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^mads\./
        /^pixels?[-.]/
        /^stat(s|istics)?[0-9]*[_.-]/
  whiteLists:
    ads:
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anudeepND/whitelist/master/domains/whitelist.txt
  clientGroupsBlock:
    default:
      - ads
clientLookup:
  upstream: tcp+udp:${GATEWAY_ADDR}
prometheus:
  enable: true
  path: /metrics
bootstrapDns: tcp:1.1.1.1
httpPort: 4000
logFormat: json
logLevel: info

0:
write_relabel_config {
  source_labels = ["namespace","pod"]
  separator = "@"
  regex = "flux-system@(.+)-.+-.+"
  target_label = "uid"
  replacement = ""
}
write_relabel_config {
  source_labels = ["namespace","pod"]
  separator = "@"
  regex = "flux-system@(.+)-.+-.+"
  target_label = "pod"
  replacement = "$1"
}
1:
write_relabel_config {
  source_labels = ["namespace","pod"]
  separator = "@"
  regex = "flux-system@(.+)-.+-.+"
  target_label = "uid"
  replacement = ""
}
write_relabel_config {
  source_labels = ["namespace","pod"]
  separator = "@"
  regex = "flux-system@(.+)-.+-.+"
  target_label = "pod"
  replacement = "$1"
}

0:
routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost
  port: 2222
  credential:
    username: ubuntu
    password: ubuntu
  vrfs:
  - name: global
    default: true
    ipv4:
      source_address: 192.0.2.1
    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1
1:
routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost

  - name: global

    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1
